name: Response Playbook for Malicious Script Execution on Server
description: This playbook outlines steps to mitigate an incident involving execution of a malicious script that led to unauthorized access and data exfiltration.

action--c5f62e47-27bb-4d9c-81d0-be8b623e.name: Kill malicious process
action--c5f62e47-27bb-4d9c-81d0-be8b623e.description: Terminate any processes that are executing the malicious script.

if-condition--d9f70b62-0edf-4879-a80f-7e.name: Check if malicious payload exists
if-condition--d9f70b62-0edf-4879-a80f-7e.description: Determine whether to delete the dropped payload.

action--b0c2ee1b-32b3-4fe6-b4b2-d6a5d235.name: Delete dropped payload
action--b0c2ee1b-32b3-4fe6-b4b2-d6a5d235.description: Remove any malicious payload that might have been dropped.

action--d9f70b62-0edf-4879-a80f-7ed8f5c4.name: Run network scan
action--d9f70b62-0edf-4879-a80f-7ed8f5c4.description: Perform a network scan to detect any suspicious devices and connections.

while-condition--e4a54b6e-c35e-42ff-ac38.name: Repeat Network Scan
while-condition--e4a54b6e-c35e-42ff-ac38.description: Continue to scan until the network is found clean.
